data.name: INCARNAGE
data.detailed_description:
BLOOD. GUTS. INCARNAGE.

INCARNAGE is an arcade-style top-down shooter that increases your speed the more you kill.
You play as Nilus, one of the lead soldiers in the rebellion against Kro-Tech and it's tyrannous rule over Krome. Fight through their forces of soldiers, mechanisms, and horrifying experiments as you move through Krome's various locales and destroy the source of the madness.

A Solo-Built Solo-Experience - 35 Hand Crafted Campaign levels to destroy!


Soldiers, Monsters, and Mechanisms - Massacre and Maul a plethora of Enemies with varying attacks!


Explore a Futuristic Dystopian City - featuring 6 areas of Krome, differing in style and colour!


Endless Arenas and Shifting Dungeons - Test your Endurance and your Swiftness!


Learn about Krome and KroTech - Detailed hand-drawn Comic Style Cutscenes!

data.short_description: Fight through forces of soldiers, mechs, and horrifying experiments in this arcade-style top-down shooter that increases your speed the more you kill.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Take these requirements with a pinch of salt.
